title.narrative: Solar Hubs and Capacity Building in Adjuntas

description.narrative: This project proposes to contribute to the vision of an alternative energy pathway for adjuntas, equipping three rural grocery stores and a hardware store with solar power. These locales will serve as solar hubs, providing energy to residents on a day-to-day basis and providing a safety net in the case of another hurricane that causes a power outage. The project also seeks to provide capacity building workshops on alternative energy for community members and business leaders, educating residents on the importance of energy independence. Casa Pueblo will also spread awareness about the project and hurricane awareness initiatives via a curriculum that will be disseminated via their radio station. Finally, the project includes basic prepositioning of emergency supplies for hurricane season.
